parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return for a single request.

Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The `token` that is used to initiate the next request if the response of the current request is truncated. You can use the token to initiate another request and obtain the remaining records.

parameters.name: PermissionName
parameters.description: The information about the permissions. For more information, see [Permission library](~~465474~~).

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceOwner
parameters.description:
The owner of the resource shares. Valid values:

*   Self: the current account
*   OtherAccounts: an account other than the current account

parameters.name: ResourceShareIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the resource shares.

Valid values of N: 1 to 5. This indicates that a maximum of five resource shares can be specified at a time.

parameters.name: ResourceShareName
parameters.description: The name of the resource share.

parameters.name: ResourceShareStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the resource shares. Valid values:

*   Active
*   Pending
*   Deleting
*   Deleted

>  The system automatically deletes the records of resource shares in the Deleted state within 48 hours to 96 hours after you delete the resource shares.
